<style>

/* ===== GENERAL RESET ===== */
html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

body {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  background-color: #f4f4f4;
  color: #333;
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  display: block;
}

/* ===== NAVBAR ===== */
.navbar {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  background-color: #1d2e3f;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  color: white;
}

.navbar-left {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.navbar-left img {
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
}

.navbar-left span {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.navbar-right {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.navbar-right a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.navbar-right a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* ===== HERO SECTION ===== */
.hero-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.hero-wrapper::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background-image: url("images/hero-background.jpg");
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  filter: blur(8px);
  z-index: -1;
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

.hero {
  display: flex;
  height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero-left {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  padding: 1.2rem;
  max-width: 900px;
}

.hero-left h1 {
  font-size: 2.8rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.hero-left p {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.apply-button {
  background-color: #16537e;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 30px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.hero-right {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100vh;
  padding-right: 0;
}

.logo-wrapper {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}

.logo-wrapper img {
  max-height: 100%;
  width: auto;
  object-fit: contain;
}

/* ===== DOUBLE SECTION ===== */
.hero-double-section {
  position: relative;
  height: 70vh;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-image: url("images/pic2.jpg");
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  color: white;
  padding: 4rem 2rem;
}

.hero-double-section::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  z-index: 0;
}

.hero-content-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: auto;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
}

.hero-double-section .hero-content {
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  text-align: justify;
}

.hero-double-section .hero-title {
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  text-align: left;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.hero-double-section .hero-subtitle {
  font-size: 0.99rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

/* ===== SECTION 3 ===== */
.hero-section4 {
  position: relative;
  height: 55vh;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.image3 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero-section4 .hero-content {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem;
  max-width: 800px;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  margin: auto;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  text-align: justify;
}

.hero-section4 .hero-title {
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  text-align: left;
}

.hero-section4 .hero-subtitle {
  font-size: 0.99rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.5;
  text-align: justify;
}

.hero-section4 .hero-subtitle ul {
  margin-top: 1rem;
  padding-left: 1.2rem;
}

.hero-section4 .hero-subtitle ul li {
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

/* ===== ACTIVITY SECTION ===== */
.activity-section h2 {
  color: white;
}

.activity-section {
  position: relative;
  padding: 3rem 1.5rem;
  color: black;
  text-align: center;
  background-image: url("images/pic3.jpg");
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.activity-section::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* σκοτεινή επικάλυψη για να ξεχωρίζει το κείμενο */
  z-index: 0;
}

.activity-section > * {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.activity-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  color: #1d2e3f;
}

.activities {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(450px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  max-width: 1000px;
  margin: auto;
}

.activity-box {
  background-color: white;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.activity-number {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  color: #16537e;
}

.swiper {
  width: 100%;
  height: 500px; /* Σταθερό ύψος για όλα τα slides */
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.swiper-slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%; /* Να γεμίζουν όλο το ύψος του slide */
  object-fit: cover; /* Κόβει την εικόνα ώστε να μην παραμορφωθεί */
  border-radius: 8px;
  display: block;
}

.swiper-button-next,
.swiper-button-prev {
  color: #16537e;
}

.activity-heading {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.activity-description {
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  line-height: 1.5;
  text-align: justify;
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .activity-subtitle {
    font-size: 1.4rem;
  }

  .activity-heading {
    font-size: 0.95rem;
  }

  .activity-description {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
  }
}

/* ===== FOOTER ===== */
footer {
  background-color: #1d2e3f;
  color: white;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 2rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.custom-footer {
  background-color: #2f4154;
  color: white;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 0rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  height: 60px;
  line-height: 38px;
  margin:0rem;
}

.custom-footer a {
  color: #ccc;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin: 0 8px;
}

.custom-footer a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* ===== RESPONSIVE ===== */
/* === RESPONSIVE FIXES === */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .nested-swiper-container {
    height: auto;
    max-height: 300px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .nested-swiper-container img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    object-fit: cover; /* Εναλλακτικά: contain ή fill ανάλογα το επιθυμητό */
    display: block;
  }

  .swiper {
    height: auto;
  }

  .caption {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
  }

  .caption h3 {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
  }

  .hero-left h1 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }

  .hero-left p {
    font-size: 0.95rem;
  }

  .hero-double-section,
  .hero-section4 {
    height: auto;
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
  }

  .hero-section4 .hero-content {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }

  .activities {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
  }
}
